body:
On 2010-09-20 20:15:22 -0700, Randolph M. Fritz said:


One of the things they seem to mean is "Clean up your Rhino model."
Another thing they probably mean is "Don't rely on WIP software."  But
it would be nice to know a bit more for the future.
--
Randolph
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: obj2rad: "bad face" and "bad triangle"References: <i7980a$ir8$1@dough.gmane.org>
